amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect the Administration's climate change and environmental sustainability executive order to ensure that no funds be used to weaken the Executive Order 13693.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to protect the Administration's climate change and environmental sustainability executive order to ensure that no funds be used to weaken the Executive Order 13693.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A089) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 472).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A089) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 236 (Roll no. 472).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A089) offered by Mr. Pocan.
